Author: Bored Logic
Title: ☀️ [ANN] ☀️ [pre-ICO] Copy Trader Ethereum Dapp: copy expert crypto traders
Body: OUR PRE-ICO SALE IS LIVE JOIN US TO GET 50% BONUS    Copy Trader is simple yet powerful ethereum Dapp designed to connect crypto experts with new traders  What is the Copy Trader?  Copy trader is Decentralized app deployed on ethereum blockchain and act as a peer to peer marketplace between expert traders (who want to monetize their skills) and newbie traders (who want to trade successfully without any experience and skills ). Copy Trader connects them in transparent and decentralized fashion easily.  Copy Trader works in 2 ways Copy Trade   How Copy Trade Works?  Copy trade is an automated trade engine via crypto exchanges api . Copy Trader uses different crypto exchange api key to automatically copy trades of expert crypto traders . Traders have to pay fixed or monthly fee set by expert traders to copy their trades. Copt Trader do not store any api key and use blockchain hashing functions so nobody knows other trader api keys . Copy Trader is deployed in ethereum blockchain so it's safe and secure. Every user can set a portion of their holdings in their exchange account to trade with copy trader.  Follow Trade   How Follow Trade Works?  Follow Trade works without entering api keys . Follow trade is a social trading feature which enables users to receive real-time trading signals from top investors. The signals are specific and detail the amount traded, assets, and the exchange or blockchain. Users can then choose to act on the signal or not. 2 types of signals are broadcasted to user.  1 : Autogenerated Signals  These signals are daily reports of expert trader portfolio and real time notifications on changes in expert trader portfolio. Signals are generated automatically by the portfolio management core which is aware of all the trades followed by the user, guaranteeing validity and transparency.  2 : Expert Trader Signals  These signals are broadcasted by Expert Trader himself. These signals can be calls on potential altcoins and new market trends and updates.  How You Receive These Signals?  All signals are broadcasted through user telegram account . Traders have to pay fixed or monthly fee set by expert traders to follow and receive these signals. Every user have to connect his/her telegram account with copy trader.  What problems does the Copy trader aim to solve?  Many blockchain investors, and certainly new users, will find it difficult to navigate the complexity of the blockchain space, understand what assets to hold, when to buy, when to sell.This steep learning curve creates a real barrier of entry for many people interested in investing in the blockchain space. Some crypto investors became leaders in discovering and assessing new investment opportunities. With Copy Traders Dapp, experienced investors can monetize their knowledge and expertise by sharing their portfolio performance and skills with other users. Expert investors can earn fees band gain influence by accumulating followers on the network(more followers more profit). New traders can make successful trades without any research and trading skills just by following or copying expert traders.  What is Copy Token?    Every feature in the Copy Trader Dapp that gives any financial value to its users will require them to pay a fee. Copy Trader is launching a ethereum based erc20 token named copy token which will be used to pay all fees on the Dapp. This creates a direct correlation between the success of the Dapp and the value of the token. The more people who use the Dapp, the more fees will be paid, the more tokens will be bought-ultimately pushing the price of the token up.  Our Copy Tokens Pre-ICO sale is live now . you need metamask wallet a chrome browser extension to contribute . join our copy token PRE-ICO sale starting for 2 weeks to get copy tokens at 50% bonus rate.  Oct 8 — Oct 22  Copy Trader Token (COPY) will be offered at 50% bonus price of 1000 COPY/ETH (vs. public sale price of 730 COPY/ETH).      JOIN OUR BOUNTY CAMPAIGN  To learn more about copy trader and pre-ICO sale or public token sale in details please visit our website or read our whitepaper      To get latest updates and support join our telegram and twitter
